Verses: 1 irandu Naalaikkuppinbu Pulippillaadha Appanjsaappidugira Paskaapandigai Vandhadhu. Appozhudhu Piradhaana Aasaariyarum Vedhapaaragarum, Avaraith Thandhiramaaip Pidiththuk Kolaiseyyumpadi Vagaithedinaargal.
2 aagilum Janangalukkulle Kalagam Undaagaadhapadikku, Pandigaiyile Appadi Seyyalaagaadhu Endraargal.

3 avar Beththaaniyaavil Kushtarogiyaayirundha Seemon Veettile Pojanapandhiyirukkaiyil, Oru Sthiree Vilaiyerappetra Naladham Ennum Uththama Thailamulla Vellaikkalparaniyaik Konduvandhu, Adhai Udaiththu, Andhath Thailaththai Avar Sirasinmel Ootrinaal.
4 appozhudhu Silar Thangalukkulle Visanamadaindhu: Indhath Thailaththai Ippadi Veenaai Selavazhippaanen?
5 idhai Munnooru Panaththirku Adhigamaana Kirayaththukku Vitru Thariththirarukkuk Kodukkalaame Endru Solli, Avalaikkuriththu Murumuruththaargal.
6 yesu Avargalai Nokki: Avalai Vittuvidungal; En Avalaith Thondharavupaduththugireergal? Ennidaththil Narkiriyaiyai Seydhirukkiraal.
7 thariththirar Eppodhum Ungalidaththil Irukkiraargal. Ungalukku Manadhundaagumpodhellaam Neengal Avargalukku Nanmai Seyyalaam; Naano Eppodhum Ungalidaththil Iren.
8 ival Thannaal Iyandrathai Seydhaal; Naan Adakkampannuvadharku Eththanamaaga, En Sareeraththil Thailampoosa Mundhikkondaal.
9 indha Suvisesham Ulagaththil Engenge Pirasangikkappadumo Angange Ivalai Ninaippadharkaaga Ival Seydhadhum Sollappadum Endru Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren Endraar.
10 appozhudhu, Panniruvaril Oruvanaagiya Yoodhaaskaariyoththu Enbavan Avaraip Piradhaana Aasaariyarukkuk Kaattikkodukkumpadi Avargalidaththirkup Ponaan.
11 avargal Adhaik Kettu, Sandhoshappattu, Avanukku Panamkoduppom Endru Vaakkuththaththampanninaargal; Avan Avaraik Kaattikkoduppadharkuth Thagundha Samayam Paarththukkondirundhaan.

12 paskaavaip Baliyidum Naalaagiya Pulippillaadha Appanjsaappidugira Mudhalaam Naalile, Avarudaiya Seeshargal Avaridaththil Vandhu: Neer Paskaavaip Pusippadharku Naangal Enge Poi Aayaththam Pannach Siththamaayirukkireer Endru Kettaargal.
13 avar Thammudaiya Seesharil Iranduperai Nokki: Neengal Nagaraththirkulle Pongal, Ange Thanneerkkudam Sumandhuvarugira Oru Manushan Ungalukku Edhirppaduvaan, Avan Pinne Pongal.
14 avan Endha Veettirkul Piravesikkiraano, Andha Veedu Ejamaanai Nokki: Naan En Seesharodukoodap Paskaavaip Pusikkiradharkuth Thagudhiyaana Idam Engeyendru Podhagar Ketkiraar Endru Sollungal.
15 avan Kambalam Mudhalaanavaigalai Viriththu Aayaththampannappattirukkira Visthaaramaana Melveettaraiyai Ungalukkuk Kaanpippaan; Ange Namakkaaga Aayaththampannungal Endru Solli Anuppinaar.
16 appadiye, Avarudaiya Seeshar Purappattu Nagaraththil Poi, Thangalukku Avar Sonnapadiye Kandu, Paskaavai Aayaththampanninaargal.
17 saayangaalamaanapodhu, Avar Panniruvarodungooda Avvidaththirku Vandhaar.
18 avargal Pandhiyamarndhu Pojanampannugaiyil, Yesu Avargalai Nokki: Ennudane Pusikkira Ungalil Oruvan Ennaik Kaattikkoduppaan Endru Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren Endraar.
19 appozhudhu Avargal Dhukkamadaindhu: Naano, Naano? Endru Ovvoruvarum Avaridaththil Ketkaththodanginaargal.
20 avar Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Ennudane Koodath Thaalaththil Kaiyidugiravanaagiya Panniruvariloruvane Avan Endru Solli;

21 manushakumaaran Thammaikkuriththu Ezhudhiyirukkirapadiye Pogiraar; Aagilum, Endha Manushanaal Manushakumaaran Kaattikkodukkappadugiraaro, Andha Manushanukku Aiyo! Andha Manushan Piravaadhirundhaanaanaal Avanukku Nalamaayirukkum Endraar.
22 avargal Pojanam Pannugaiyil, Yesu Appaththai Eduththu Aaseervadhiththu, Adhaippittu, Avargalukkuk Koduththu: Neengal Vaangip Pusiyungal, Idhu Ennudaiya Sareeramaayirukkiradhu Endraar.
23 pinbu, Paaththiraththaiyum Eduththu Sthoththirampanni, Adhai Avargalukkuk Koduththaar. Avargal Ellaarum Adhile Baanampanninaargal.
24 appozhudhu Avar Avargalai Nokki: Idhu Anegarukkaaga Sindhappadugira Pudhu Udanpadikkaikkuriya Ennudaiya Raththamaayirukkiradhu.
25 naan Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththil Navamaana Rasaththaip Baanampannum Naalvaraikkum Thiraatchappazharasaththai Ini Naan Baanampannuvadhillaiyendru Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren Endraar.
26 avargal Sthoththirappaattaip Paadina Pinbu, Olivamalaikkup Purappattup Ponaargal.
27 appozhudhu Yesu Avargalai Nokki: Meyppanai Vettuven, Aadugal Sidharadikkappadum Endru Ezhudhiyirukkirapadi, Indha Raaththiriyile Neengal Ellaarum Ennimiththam Idaraladaiveergal.
28 aagilum Naan Uyirththezhundha Pinbu, Ungalukku Munne Galileyaavukkup Poven Endraar.
29 adharkup Pedhuru: Umadhunimiththam Ellaarum Idaraladaindhaalum, Naan Idaraladaiyen Endraan.
30 yesu Avanai Nokki: Indraikku, Indha Raaththiriyile, Seval Irandudharam Koovugiradharku Munne, Nee Moondru Tharam Ennai Marudhalippaai Endru Meyyaagave Unakku Sollugiren Endraar.
31 adharku Avan: Naan Ummode Marikkavendiyadhaayirundhaalum, Ummai Marudhalikkamaatten Endru Urudhiyaai Sonnaan; Ellaarum Appadiye Sonnaargal.
32 pinbu Gethsamane Ennappatta Idaththirku Vandhaargal. Appozhudhu Avar Thammudaiya Seeshargalai Nokki: Naan Jebampannumalavum Inge Utkaarnthirungal Endru Solli;
33 pedhuruvaiyum Yaakkobaiyum Yovaanaiyum Thammode Koottikkondupoi, Thigiladaiyavum, Migavum Viyaagulappadavum Thodanginaar.
34 appozhudhu, Avar: En Aaththumaa Maranaththukkedhuvaana Dhukkankondirukkiradhu. Neengal Inge Thangi, Vizhiththirungal Endru Solli,
35 satru Appurampoi, Tharaiyile Vizhundhu, Andha Velai Thammaivittu Neengippogakkoodumaanaal Adhu Neengavendumendru Vendikkondu:
36  Appaa Pidhaave, Ellaam Ummaale Koodum; Indhap Paaththiraththai Ennilirundhu Eduththuppodum, Aagilum En Siththaththinpadiyalla, Ummudaiya Siththaththinpadiye Aagakkadavadhu Endraar.
37 pinbu, Avar Vandhu, Avargal Niththiraipannugiradhaikkandu, Pedhuruvai Nokki: Seemone, Niththirai Pannugiraayaa? Oru Mani Neram Nee Vizhiththirukkakkoodaadhaa?
38 neengal Sodhanaikkutpadaadhapadikku Vizhiththirundhu Jebampannungal; Aavi Urchaagamulladhudhaan, Maamsamo Balaveenamulladhu Endraar.
39 avar Marupadiyum Poi, Andha Vaarththaigalaiye Solli Jebampanninaar.

40 avar Thirumba Vandhapodhu, Avargal Marupadiyum Niththiraipannugiradhaik Kandaar; Avargaludaiya Kangal Migundha Niththiraimayakkam Adaindhirundhapadiyaal, Thaangal Marumozhiyaaga Avarukku Solvadhu Innadhendru Ariyaadhirundhaargal.
41 avar Moondraandharam Vandhu: Ini Niththiraipanni Ilaippaarungal; Podhum, Velai Vandhadhu, Idho, Manushakumaaran Paavigaludaiya Kaigalil Oppukkodukkappadugiraar.
42 ennaik Kaattikkodukkiravan, Idho, Vandhuvittaan, Ezhundhirungal Povom Endraar.

43 udane, Avar Ippadip Pesugaiyil Panniruvaril Oruvanaagiya Yoodhaas Vandhaan; Avanode Koodap Piradhaana Aasaariyarum Vedhapaaragarum Moopparum Anuppina Thiralaana Janangal, Pattayangalaiyum, Thadigalaiyum Pidiththukkonduvandhaargal.
44 avaraik Kaattikkodukkiravan: Naan Evanai Muththanjseyveno Avandhaan, Avanaip Pidiththu Baththiramaaik Kondupongal Endru Avargalukkuk Kurippu Solliyirundhaan.
45 avan Vandhavudane, Avarandaiyil Serndhu: Rabee, Rabee, Endru Solli, Avarai Muththanjseydhaan.
46 appozhudhu Avargal Avarmel Kaipottu, Avaraip Pidiththaargal.
47 appozhudhu Koodanindravargalil Oruvan Kaththiyai Uruvi, Piradhaana Aasaariyanudaiya Velaikkaaranaik Kaadhara Vettinaan.
48 yesu Avargalai Nokki: Kallanaip Pidikkap Purappadugiradhupola, Neengal Pattayangalaiyum, Thadigalaiyum Eduththukkondu Ennaip Pidikkavandheergal;
49 naan Dhinandhorum Ungal Naduvile Dhevaalayaththil Ubadhesam Pannikkondirundhen; Appozhudhu, Neengal Ennaip Pidikkavillaiye; Aanaalum Vedhavaakkiyangal Niraiveravendiyadhaayirukkiradhu Endraar.
50 appozhudhu Ellaarum Avaraivittu Odipponaargal.
51 oru Vaaliban Oru Dhuppattiyai Maaththiram Thanmel Porththukkondu Avar Pinne Ponaan; Avanaip Pidiththaargal.
52 avan Than Dhuppattiyaip Pottuvittu, Nirvaanamaai Avargalaivittu Odipponaan.
53 yesuvai Avargal Piradhaana Aasaariyanidaththil Konduponaargal; Ange Aasaariyar Mooppar Vedhapaaragar Ellaarum Koodivandhirundhaargal.
54 pedhuru Dhooraththile Avarukkup Pinsendru, Piradhaana Aasaariyanudaiya Aramanaikkul Vandhu, Sevakarodekooda Utkaarndhu, Neruppandaiyile Kulirkaaindhukondirundhaan.
55 appozhudhu Piradhaana Aasaariyarum Aalosanai Sangaththaaranaivarum Yesuvaik Kolaiseyyumpadi Avarukku Virodhamaaga Saatchi Thedinaargal; Agappadavillai.
56 anegar Avarukku Virodhamaagap Poisaatchi Solliyum, Andha Saatchigal Ovvavillai.
57 appozhudhu Silar Ezhundhu, Kaivelaiyaagiya Indhath Dhevaalayaththai Naan Idiththuppottu, Kaivelaiyallaadha Verondrai Moondru Naalaikkulle Kattuven Endru Ivan Sonnadhai Naangal Kettom Endru,
58 avarukku Virodhamaaip Poisaatchi Sonnaargal.
59 appadi Solliyum Avargal Saatchi Ovvaamarpoyitru.
60 appozhudhu Piradhaana Aasaariyan Ezhundhu Naduve Nindru, Yesuvai Nokki: Ivargal Unakku Virodhamaai Sollugiradhaikkuriththu Nee Ondrum Sollugiradhillaiyaa Endru Kettaan.
61 avaro Oru Uththaravum Sollaamal Pesaadhirundhaar. Marupadiyum Piradhaana Aasaariyan Avarai Nokki: Nee Sthoththirikkappatta Dhevanudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Kiristhudhaanaa? Endru Kettaan.
62 adharku Yesu: Naan Avardhaan; Manushakumaaran Sarva Vallavarin Valadhu Paarisaththil Veetriruppadhaiyum, Vaanaththin Megangalmel Varuvadhaiyum Neengal Kaanbeergal Endraar.
63 piradhaana Aasaariyan Idhaikkettavudane, Than Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththukkondu: Ini Saatchigal Namakku Vendiyadhenna?
64 dhevadhooshanaththaik Ketteergale. Ungalukku Ennamaaith Thondrugiradhu Endraan. Adharku Avargalellaarum: Ivan Maranaththukkup Paaththiranaayirukkiraan Endru Theermaanampanninaargal.

65 appozhudhu Silar Avarmel Thuppavum, Avarudaiya Mugaththai Moodavum, Avaraik Kuttavum, Gnaanathirushtiyinaale Paarththu Sol Endru Sollavum Thodanginaargal; Velaikkaararum Avaraik Kannaththil Araindhaargal.
66 aththarunaththile Pedhuru Keezhe Aramanai Mutraththilirukkaiyil, Piradhaana Aasaariyanudaiya Velaikkaarigalil Oruththi Vandhu,
67 kulirkaaindhu Kondirukkira Pedhuruvaikkandu, Avanai Utruppaarththu: Neeyum Nasareyanaagiya Yesuvode Irundhaai Endraal.
68 adharku Avan: Naan Ariyen; Nee Sollugiradhu Enakkuth Theriyaadhu Endru Marudhaliththu, Veliye Vaasal Mandabaththukkup Ponaan; Appozhudhu Seval Koovitru.
69 velaikkaari Avanai Marupadiyum Kandu: Ivan Avargalil Oruvan Endru Aruge Nindravargalukku Sonnaal.

70 avan Marupadiyum Marudhaliththaan. Satruneraththukkuppinbu Marupadiyum Aruge Nindravargal Pedhuruvaippaarththu: Meyyaagave Nee Avargalil Oruvan, Nee Galileyan, Un Pechchu Adharku Oththirukkiradhu Endraargal.
71 adharku Avan: Neengal Sollugira Manushanai Ariyen Endru Solli, Sabikkavum Saththiyampannavum Thodanginaan.

72 udane Seval Irandaandharam Koovitru. Seval Irandudharang Koovugiradharkumunne Nee Ennai Moondru Dharam Marudhalippaai Endru Yesu Thanakku Sonna Vaarththaiyaip Pedhuru Ninaivu Koorndhu, Migavum Azhudhaan.
